cast.name: 弗拉德米尔·米什科夫 Vladimir Mishukov
索菲亚·格谢维奇 Sofya Gershevich
亚历山德拉·比斯特日茨卡娅 Aleksandra Bystrzhitskaya

awards:
第42届蒙特利尔世界电影节(2018)
　　美洲大奖(提名) Михаил Сегал
introduction: In the case of a thoughtless mistake, the life of each person can radically change, and in what direction, it is up to the owner of his destiny to decide. The main character grew up in a poor family. He perfectly saw how hard his parents worked, and looking at what was happening, he was perfectly aware that wealth never shines to a guy. The problem of the guy was sluggishness and self-doubt, not allowing a young man to cherish a dream. The main character in the movie "Elephants can play football" made numerous attempts to realize their dreams, but everything always ended in failure. And suddenly, fortune presents a surprise that radically changed the fate of the hero. Fatal turn of events made of yesterday's loser and loser, a respected and popular man. Now before him new life assignments, where a successful young man must get used to the chic life, and take what is happening for granted. The only problem is the damned uncertainty, and the opportunity to spoil the situation again.
